title: Magic Bow & Sword Sounds
description: 264 high-quality weapon sounds (135 as the standard version and 129 with an echo enhancement)
longDescription:
Magic Bow & Sword Sounds

264 high-quality weapon sounds (135 as the standard version and 129 with an echo enhancement).

They are divided in:

- Magic Sword

- Magic Bow

- Elemental Sword (Fire, Ice, Water, Wind, Thunder, Earth, Sci-Fi, Holy)

- Elemental Bow (Fire, Ice, Water, Wind, Thunder, Earth, Sci-Fi, Holy)

- Dark Sword

- Etc...


🔊YouTube Link (hear the video preview of the 264 SFX)

📜  Tracklist PDF


(optional) Soundcloud link (hear the audio preview of the 264 SFX)


This weapons sounds have the following actions:

- Attacks (different intensities)

- Magic Attacks

- Blocks

- Clashes

- Whooshes

- Etc...


Can be complemented with:

Magic Sci-Fi Sword Sounds

Battle & Wounds Sounds


More about the pack:

- Intuitive file naming.

- Very easy to implement in your game.

- Put more life to your game with this pack.

- A very good resource to put sound to your magical weapons!


[Format]

All files are in:

WAV - Stereo 44.1 Khz, 16bit


[Contact]

potion.audio@gmail.com
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 264

Number of Audio Cues: 264

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 10 minutes 16 seconds
